# Patient Facts

The completeness-focused checks in the Patient Facts module assess the
availability of patient clinical data. The number of clinical events per
year of follow-up for each patient in a cohort is computed and
stratified by visit type in order to help investigators evaluate
utilization patterns across the cohort.

## Installation

You can install the development version of this package like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github('ssdqa/patientfacts')
```

# Package index

## Module Execution

- [`pf_process()`](https://ssdqa.github.io/patientfacts/reference/pf_process.md)
  : Patient Facts
- [`pf_output()`](https://ssdqa.github.io/patientfacts/reference/pf_output.md)
  : Patient Facts – Output Generation

## Sample Input

- [`pf_domain_file`](https://ssdqa.github.io/patientfacts/reference/pf_domain_file.md)
  : Patient Facts Domain File Sample
- [`pf_visit_file_omop`](https://ssdqa.github.io/patientfacts/reference/pf_visit_file_omop.md)
  : Patient Facts Visit File Sample – OMOP version
- [`pf_visit_file_pcornet`](https://ssdqa.github.io/patientfacts/reference/pf_visit_file_pcornet.md)
  : Patient Facts Visit File Sample – PCORnet version
